name: react-redux-bootstrap-webpack-starter
description: react js + redux + react router + hot reload + devTools + bootstrap + webpack starter
author: Erwan DATIN <erwan.datin@gmail.com> (MacKentoch)

scripts.install-front: echo '#####  installing front dependencies  #####' && cd ./front && npm install && cd ..
scripts.install-server: echo '#####  installing server dependencies  #####' && cd ./server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.init: npm run install-front && npm run install-server
